short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a QR code for the page URL with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool will create a QR code for the webpage you're on with one click to share the link with your smartphone.

It also allows you to create a QR code for any text you want.

You can share information between your devices in a simple and easy way.
